CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 11, 1953, pg. 12, reads: "Easter Egg Hunt - The members of the Junior League gave an Easter Egg Hunt for some two dozen youngsters Easter Monday in Alpha House. Some of he JL's are pictured here including Beverly Butler, Joanne Vanderhoop, Roberta Ratcliffe, Marva Hord, and Toni Bray, guest of her sister, Bootsie, all front row.  In the rear are Gay Cyrus, Sara Burney, Joan Hobson, Kay Stokes and Boa[o]tsie Bray.  Several youngsters from Kay Club, plus small brothers and sisters of the JL's were in attendance, as well as several mothers of the Leaguers. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of ten members of Junior League holding eggs, front row from left: Beverly Butler, Joanne Vanderhoop, Roberta Ratcliffe, Marva Hord, Toni Bray; back row: Gay Cyrus, Sara Burney, Joan Hobson, Kay Stokes, and LouJeanne "Bootsie" Bray, standing on steps of Alpha Psi Alpha House for Easter egg hunt
